type: rotary wing drone and base station
short_summary: Canada is seeking offers to provide a rotary wing drone and base station.
description: Canada is seeking offers from Offerors to provide one (1) rotary wing drone and base station to Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada.
full_summary:
### 01804-230331 - Tender for Rotary Wing Drone procurement Announcement
#### Reference Number
WS3859883962-Doc4051603686

#### Solicitation Number
WS3859883962

#### Public Notice Date
June 13, 2023

#### Tender Closing Date
July 5, 2023 (14:00:00)

#### Amended Date
June 27, 2023

#### Expected Contract Start Date
August 15, 2023

#### Tender Status
Expired

### Service Description
Canada is seeking a single rotary wing drone and base station for Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada. The contract duration will be from the date of award until March 31, 2024, inclusive. 

### Request for Proposal
Bid solicitation details are listed within the contract documentation. Interested parties can request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation, provided they make the request to the contracting authority within 15 working days from receipt of notification that their bid was unsuccessful.

If awarded, contractors will be required to adhere to the Canadian Content Policy as defined within the solicitation document.

### Contact Information
To obtain further details, contact Erin Surette, Integrated Procurement Branch, at (elle-la / she-her):

**Email:** erin.surette@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Please note:** The above-mentioned contact details are subject to change without notice.

### Document Attachments
For further information, please refer to the tender documentation package available on the Ariba Discovery platform. The purchase and download of documents is strictly governed by the terms and conditions of the platform.

### Trade Agreements
Canada encourages participating vendors with the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### Regions of Opportunity
The procurement opportunity is available in Nova Scotia, with delivery of equipment to the Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food in Nova Scotia.

### Region of Delivery
Nova Scotia, Canada. 

### Department of Contracting Entity
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) 
**Address:** 11, rue Laurier, Phase III, Place du Portage, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada 
**Contact:** Erin Surette, Integrated Procurement Branch 

### Point of Contact
Erin Surette can provide additional procurement details and respond to inquiries via her electronic address-based mailbox. Please note that contract details, vendor answers, etc. are entirely the responsibility of contractors and their appointed representatives. [erin.surette
